Title: Data transmission through up to 74.8 km of hollow-core fiber with coherent and direct-detect transceivers
Abstract: © 2015 Viajes el Corte Ingles, VECISA.An optical transmission loop experiment over hollow-core fiber is demonstrated with 1.25Gb/s OOK, 40G DP-QPSK, 100G DP-QPSK modulation schemes over distances of 31.0 km, 74.8 km, 55.8 km respectively, using two fiber spans with 2.7 km and 3.5 km length.
